member.name: T:Honeycomb.OpenTelemetry.DeterministicSampler
member.summary:
This Sampler implementation allows for distributed sampling based on a trace ID. It accepts a sample rate N and will deterministically sample 1/N events based on the target field. Hence, two or more processes can decide whether or not to sample related events without communication.
- A sample rate of 0 means the Sampler will never sample.
- A sampler rate of 1 means the Sampler will always sample.
This implementation is based on the implementations (and necessarily needs to be in line with) other Honeycomb SDK implementations.

member.name: M:Honeycomb.OpenTelemetry.DeterministicSampler.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The desired sample rate, expressed as 1/{sampleRate}.
